title: 10 year poro icon
body: I got the Riot Kayle skin, but no 10 year poro icon? How can I get it and why haven't I got it yet?

replies.body: The gifts are being sent out individually per the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  It will take some time to gift out every eligible account.  Patience!

Thy are being handed out separately, not at the same time, so it's normal to receive one before the other. The final day to get them is the 23rd, so if you don't have the icon by then, you can submit a support ticket.
